description.value:
Race: Locathah 
Replaced Trait(s): Natural Armor 

Although all locathahs have a distinctly fishy odor out of the water, some locathahs have slimier skin that exudes a strong scent both above and below the waves. Locathahs who have this racial trait emit a terrible scent as a 15-foot aura that nearly every other creature finds offensive. This is a poison effect. All living creatures (except other locathahs and creatures with the stench ability) within the aura must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + half the locathah's character level + the locathah's Constitution modifier) or be sickened for 5 rounds. Creatures that succeed at the saving throw cannot be sickened by the same locathah's powerful smell for 24 hours. A delay poison or neutralize poison spell or similar effect removes the effect from the sickened creature. Due to their smell, locathahs with this racial trait have a ï¿½4 penalty on Stealth checks. This racial trait replaces natural armor.
